artist: Designer: Larsen Design Studio, New York; Designer: Paul Gedeohn; Producer: Jack Lenor Larsen, Inc.
description: Wide horiz. bands with tulip-like vert. flowers & stems. Vert. rpt. 29"; horiz. rpt. 26.5". Chintz finish. Large floral pattern in aqua, mauve, lavender & gray. Horiz. Rpt. 26-1/2"; vert. Rpt. 29". Chintz finish. Water Lily
